Dear Hagop,

Good day to you.
I need your assistance with the insurance-related clauses (1.1(i), 2.1(iii), and 2.1(iv)) that Zain mentioned. For context, the agreement involves test driving E-vans for Chalhoub B2B operations through Jameel Motors for a duration of two weeks.

Your prompt review and feedback on these clauses would be greatly appreciated, as it will enable me to finalize the agreement and proceed with booking the slots.

Thank you for your support!

Best regards,
Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
 <https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1-Ddizmpxe9_kDi6uzmzWJjHqGqyKkU0f&export=download>

Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE

Dear Jackie,

As discussed, the insurance clause should be amended as follows:

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C182OM4_01
From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
To: jmerchant <jmerchant@ev-lab.io>
CC: Faraz Hasan <Faraz.hasan@chalhoub.com>; Zain Manna <Zain.Manna@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-04-28 17:50
Subject: Re: Draft for review
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Jackie,

As discussed, the insurance clause should be amended as follows:



1.	 it EV LAB shall affect and maintain throughout the Testing Period, and during Term of this Agreement with a reputable insurance company a policy or policies of insurance providing an adequate level of cover in respect of all risks which may be incurred under this Agreement and otherwise the level of cover required by the UAE regulations and applicable law. Such policies shall include, but not be limited to, professional indemnity insurance, general public insurance, all risks insurance, workmen’s compensation insurance. EVLAB shall produce for JMT’s representative, on request, copies of all insurance policies applicable to this Agreement and the extent of the cover given by those policies, together with receipts or other evidence of payment of the latest premiums due under those policies.

Notes:

1.	 it EV LAB shall affect and maintain throughout the Testing Period, and during Term of this Agreement with a reputable insurance company a policy or policies of insurance providing an adequate level of cover in respect of all risks which may be incurred under this Agreement and otherwise the level of cover required by the UAE regulations and applicable law. Such policies shall include, but not be limited to, professional indemnity insurance, general public insurance, all risks insurance, workmen’s compensation insurance. EVLAB shall produce for JMT’s representative, on request, copies of all insurance policies applicable to this Agreement and the extent of the cover given by those policies, together with receipts or other evidence of payment of the latest premiums due under those policies.

Notes:


*	
	Professional Indemnity Insurance is not required, as this Agreement does not involve specialized professional services.
*	
	Liability insurance is sufficiently covered under the existing Vehicle Insurance; therefore, additional liability coverage is not necessary.
*	
	Property insurance is not necessary since the sole property involved—the vehicle under testing—is already covered under the Vehicle Comprehensive Insurance policy.


Trust the above clarifies.

Best Regards,
Hagop

We discussed this with our legal team, and they have suggested to keep this clause as follows as they cannot omit it:

 

1.	it shall affect and maintain throughout the Testing Period, and during Term of this Agreement with a reputable insurance company a policy or policies of insurance providing an adequate level of cover in respect of all risks insurance which may be incurred under this Agreement and otherwise the level of cover required by the UAE regulations and applicable law. On Mon, Apr 28, 2025 at 5:50 PM Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > wrote:


	Dear Jackie,

	As discussed, the insurance clause should be amended as follows:
	
	

	1.	 it EV LAB shall affect and maintain throughout the Testing Period, and during Term of this Agreement with a reputable insurance company a policy or policies of insurance providing an adequate level of cover in respect of all risks which may be incurred under this Agreement and otherwise the level of cover required by the UAE regulations and applicable law. Such policies shall include, but not be limited to, professional indemnity insurance, general public insurance, all risks insurance, workmen’s compensation insurance. EVLAB shall produce for JMT’s representative, on request, copies of all insurance policies applicable to this Agreement and the extent of the cover given by those policies, together with receipts or other evidence of payment of the latest premiums due under those policies.

	Notes:


	*	
		Professional Indemnity Insurance is not required, as this Agreement does not involve specialized professional services.
	*	
		Liability insurance is sufficiently covered under the existing Vehicle Insurance; therefore, additional liability coverage is not necessary.
	*	
		Property insurance is not necessary since the sole property involved—the vehicle under testing—is already covered under the Vehicle Comprehensive Insurance policy.


	Trust the above clarifies.

	Best Regards,
	Hagop
